title: Home mortgage debt of households and nonprofit organizations in the U.S. 2012 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Debt in trillion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Debt in trillion U.S. dollars is highest at Quarter Q3 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q3 2014.
There is a difference of 1.08 between the maximum Quarter Q3 2019 and minimum Quarter Q3 2014.
